price: ហើយជាការពិតណាស់ ពួកអ្នកបានដឹងនូវការបង្កើត ដំបូង។ ដូចេ្នះ ហេតុអ្វីបានជាពួកអ្នកមិននឹកឃើញ?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu al-nashata al-ūlā falawlā tadhakkarūna
